content: hulka s tutorial to learn this technique magic ring tutorial or if you prefer chain 3 and join with a slip_stitch ch2 4hdc in ring join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 ch2 - 5hdc total - move on to round 3 2 ch2 4hdc in magic_ring and tighten join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 -5hdc total 3 ch2 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 - 10 half_double_crochet total 4 ch2 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 -20 half_double_crochet total 5 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 -30 half_double_crochet total 6 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 - 40 half_double_crochet total 7 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in next 3 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 ch2 - 50 half_double_crochet total 8 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 ch2 - 60 half_double_crochet total 9 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in the next 5 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 ch2 - 70 half_double_crochet total continue in this manner of increase until flat top circle of hat is the desired size i stopped increasing after 9 rounds about 6 inches 15 cm set up round - half_double_crochet in each stitch around increase or decrease a few stitches in this round if you need to to end up with a total number of stitches that is a multiple of 8 i increased 2 stitches to end up with 72 half_double_crochet begin cable pattern 1 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 half_double_crochet remember that the ch2 is your first stitch of the round and counts as the first of the 4hdc fpt around next 4 half_double_crochet repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 2 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet skip 2 fpt 1 fpt around each of the next 2 fpt go back and work 1 fpt around each of the 2 fpt you skipped these stitches cross over the first 2 fpt repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 3 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 half_double_crochet 1 fpt around each of the next 4 fpt you really have to dig for that second fpt repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 4 repeat round 2 5 repeat round 3 continue in this manner until hat is desired length i made mine about 4 inches 10 cm then added a folded brim last round ch2
